TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpApplicationState extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class HttpApplicationState Inherits NameObjectCollectionBase

summary.span: 允许共享 ASP.NET 应用程序内多个会话和请求之间的全局信息。

span.span: Enables sharing of global information across multiple sessions and requests within an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 应用程序是所有文件、 页、 处理程序、 模块和的作用域的虚拟目录以及在一台 Web 服务器上的及其子目录中的代码的总数。An ASP.NET application is the sum of all files, pages, handlers, modules, and code within the scope of a virtual directory and its subdirectories on a single Web server. 单个实例创建第一次客户端请求从特定的 ASP.NET 应用程序虚拟目录中的任何 URL 资源类。A single instance of an class is created the first time a client requests any URL resource from within a particular ASP.NET application virtual directory. 为每个 Web 服务器上的 ASP.NET 应用程序创建单独的单个实例。A separate single instance is created for each ASP.NET application on a Web server. 对每个实例的引用随后将通过内部函数对象。A reference to each instance is then exposed via the intrinsic object. 不跨 Web 场 （在其中应用程序承载跨多个服务器） 或 Web 园 （在其中应用程序承载在同一台计算机上的多个进程之间） 共享应用程序状态。Application state is not shared across either a Web farm (in which an application is hosted across multiple servers) or a Web garden (in which an application is hosted across multiple processes on the same computer).

span.span: This type is thread safe.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Lock() cil managed

summary.span: 锁定对 变量的访问以促进访问同步。

span.span: Locks access to an variable to facilitate access synchronization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类执行自动的锁定和解锁与和属性和， ， ， ， ，和方法。The class performs automatic locking and unlocking with the and properties and the , , , , , and methods. 但是，显式使用和时具有一系列操作的方法可能更加有效。However, explicitly using the and methods when you have a series of operations may be more efficient. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法和方法，以防止其他会话本地会话更改它们后更改之前的两个应用程序变量的值。The following example uses the method and method to prevent other sessions from changing the value of two application variables until after the local session has changed them. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpApplicationState.Lock Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpApplicationState.Lock Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpApplicationState.Lock Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpApplicationState.Lock Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StaticObjects As HttpStaticObjectsCollection

summary.span: 获取由 标记声明的所有对象，其中范围设置为 ASP.NET 应用程序中的“Application”。

span.span: Gets all objects declared by an tag where the scope is set to "Application" within the ASP.NET application.
A collection of objects on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Global.asax 文件中定义应用程序对象``标记。Application objects are defined in the Global.asax file inside the `` tags. ## Examples 下面的示例获取到的所有应用程序对象变量和对象的数目大于 0 的情况下，才会执行一个例程。The following example gets all application objects into a variable and executes a routine only if the number of objects is greater than 0. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpApplicationState.StaticObjects Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpApplicationState.StaticObjects Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpApplicationState.StaticObjects Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpApplicationState.StaticObjects Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
